name: Good Goods Inc
description:
Good Goods Incorporated is a cute logistics tycoon game set on Earth. You're the CEO of a small company that buy and sells good and your goal is to make a lot of money!

Features

  • Use boats, airplanes and delivery vans to ship your goods all around the world
  • Start on a different place on Earth every time
  • Golden airplanes!
  • 1+ hrs of gameplay

Controls

  • Left click: select, interact
  • Right click: deselect
  • Arrow keys/WASD/MMB: move camera
  • Space: Toggle 3x speed
  • Escape: menu
  • Tab: Cycle through vehicles & offices
  • E: Show all market & factory goods
  • F12: Hide UI
  • M: Mute audio
